dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, August 01, 2005 1:03 PM
To: support@penguin-uk.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Mon, 1 Aug 2005 17:20:37 +0100
From: Penguin Support <support@penguin-uk.com>
Reply-To: Penguin Support <support@penguin-uk.com>
Organization: Penguin Computer Services
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

We would like to draw to your attention a matter of copyright infringement
with one of your dedicated server customers. We have today discovered that
they have duplicated our own website for their own, and as of yet haven't
even changed all of the links and text on there so that it still has
references to our company. our website is http://penguin-uk.com and theirs
is http://www.burhaminternet.com. Their server/site dedicated IP address is
70.84.13.251. We would appreciate it of you can take immediate action
against your client under the terms of your AUP as this matter is will be
taken up formally with our solicitors for infringement of our copyright,
many thanks

Chris Hemmings
Technical Manager
Penguin Computer Services
http://penguin-uk.com

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFC7mO7vK/XpJs6oyURAjHrAJ4g7PiZkLkgqteRxfRH2OSKQIY6kACfYCMA
0JdyA4eOgiBGR93YZDuIYdc=
=EOzd
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
